d_cave.name: Dark Cave
d_cave.description: A cave with little light in it. There is a sign on the wall

even_der_cave.name: Even darker cave
even_der_cave.description: A cave with even less light in it

light_cave.name: Light Cave
light_cave.description: A cave with light in it

d_cave_sign.name: Sign
d_cave_sign.interact: Go forth to eternal life. Go fifth and get a free toaster.
